name: Allthetopbananas.com
tag_list: job-search, mobile, mobile-recruiting, advertising, mobile-advertising, recruitment-advertising
description: Mobile recruiting and job search engine
overview:
Allthetopbananas.com is the leading UK Job Search engine and rapidly growing mobile recruiting application solution provider for companies worldwide.

In the UK Allthetopbananas.com provides aggregation service of major UK job boards. The site provides advertisers the highest click to vacancy application ratio available in the aggregation sector or search engine marketing. The site offers job seekers an advanced jobs by email service which behind the scenes creates a complex job seeker digital portrait that monitors the jobseekers pragmatic journey to ensure suitable and relevant jobs are always emailed. This electronic agent service is currently underplayed on the site, which will be a major change in 2011.

Allthetopbananas.com were early to recognise the importance of mobile Internet and specifically applications on iPhone, Android, etc. Being one of early job seeking apps pioneers in the UK the company now offers expert solution for recruiters and hiring companies worldwide. With over 40 published client applications the company is looking forwards to 2011 which will see many global blue chip clients launch their mobile recruiting applications.

As a true evangelist of Mobile Internet Allthetopbananas.com funds a site dedicated to educating recruiters and HR about mobile Internet, learn or contribute at www.moRecNews.com

For additional information please either contact sales@allthetopbananas.com or the Managing Director & Founder Dave Martin at Dave@Allthetopbananas.com
